    committer: mimir
    timestamp: Tue 2007-04-24 08:36:41 +0000
    message:
      UsrCtx should be created within UsersView. Tree widget just
      opens it and passes the domain name(s) to operate on (selectable
      via combo box).
      
      
      rafal
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11989.1.7
    merged: svn-v2:22498@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    parent: svn-v2:22497@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    committer: abartlet
    timestamp: Tue 2007-04-24 07:57:44 +0000
    message:
      The initial LDIF import into Fedora DS didn't work, so just push this
      onto the end of dse.ldif.
      
      This make Fedora DS work with multiple naming contexts.
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11989.1.6
    merged: svn-v2:22497@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    parent: svn-v2:22494@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    committer: abartlet
    timestamp: Tue 2007-04-24 05:57:56 +0000
    message:
      Support renaming objectclasses and attributes for the LDAP backend. 
      
      OpenLDAP is fussy about operational attributes in user-supplied
      schema.
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------
    revno: 11989.1.5
    merged: svn-v2:22494@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    parent: svn-v2:22488@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
    committer: abartlet
    timestamp: Mon 2007-04-23 21:56:23 +0000
    message:
      Skip subSchema again, but we will need to remap this objectClass.
      
      Make the Fedora DS backend test again.
      
      Andrew Bartlett
    ------------------------------------------------------------

    message:
      Add a separate widget class for listing users and reposition
      things on NetManager's screen. Qooxdoo layout positioning can
      be tricky sometimes...
      
      
      rafal

      add a flag to ignore timeouts of a request and don't close
      the connection on timeout
      
      metze
